import React, { useState } from "react"; import NewLogin from "./NewLogin"; import "./style.css"; import zohocompanylogo from "./containers/zohosignin.jpeg"; import Microsoftsignin from "./Microsoftsignin"; import kaizenlogo from "./Kaizenlogo.jpeg"; const Multiuser_Login_Page = () => { const [employeeuser_id, setEmployeeuserid] = useState(""); const [userpassword, setuserPassword] = useState(""); const [alluserEntry, setuserAllEntry] = useState([]); const submituserForm = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const newuserEntry = { employeeuser_id: employeeuser_id, userpassword: userpassword } setuserAllEntry([...alluserEntry, newuserEntry]); } return (
{/*

< Microsoftsignin/>
) } export default Multiuser_Login_Page;
